website_summaries.verdict: Quiet and inexpensive to run, this option provides many adjustable options to meet your needs.
pros: Features reversible double doors and adjustable legs for leveling
Temperatures are adjustable between 32ºF and 50 ºF in the refrigerator, and -11.2ºF and 5ºF in the freezer
cons: Some buyers say that the temperatures inside this compact refrigerator are erratic and not consistent

website_summaries.verdict: A double-reversible refrigerator and freezer that may help you save money on your energy bills.
pros: Freestanding streamlined design will complement any kitchen or outdoor space
Compact unit can be tucked under a counter or built into a cabinet or piece of furniture for a customized look
cons: Temperature regulation tends to be inconsistent
May cause condensation inside the refrigerator

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT Solution
customer_reviews.text: I decided to scale back when redecorating my apartment kitchen by removing the large old appliances and replacing them with smaller new ones. This fridge is perfect for a single person. A few hints: 1. cut egg cartons in half so they can stack, 2. buy milk with screw on caps so it can be stored on its side. 3. Invest in small disposable storage containers 4. Removing the crisper drawer allows for much more room.
customer_reviews.author: Preston

customer_reviews.title: Very inconsistent temperature regulation. Got it for a personal ...
customer_reviews.text: Very inconsistent temperature regulation. Got it for a personal fridge in my office. It will alternately freeze things in the fridge portion, or stop cooling long enough to make everything in it sweat everywhere. I would RMA it and send it back but it came in one enormous box surrounded by styrofoam that promptly tore to pieces as soon as I unboxed it, so sending it back would be a logistic nightmare. Go to a brick and mortar store if you are in the market for a small personal fridge so you can have some support and take it back if it isn't working properly.
customer_reviews.author: Jared V

customer_reviews.title: Prefect! Quiet and looking nice.
customer_reviews.text: We were remodeling the house, and bought all new appliances. In meanwhile, the work was going slow, and nothing was connected. Living without a fridge was not an option for us. I spent hours, looking for something not expensive but with some future perspective as a wine or bar cooler. This little thing is the best! For its small.size it has a pretty big size freezer, amazing. Not noisy, we had it for a while in master bedroom and I'm the sensitive one, no noise allowed. Surprised and happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: ira12

customer_reviews.title: Mine Is Wortless!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of all the positive reviews. However, the freezer works great, but the refrigerator will not stay cold enough. My milk spoiled within 3 days, and the margarine will not even solidify, and yes I have it set to max cold. I am very disappointed in this product. I have missed the time limit to return this product, as I purchased it for a family room that has just been completed, and we just opened and turned it on a week ago. Maybe this one is just a lemon, and the rest are good I don't know.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: "Works like a good fridge should."
customer_reviews.text: It arrived extremely quickly, reasonably well-packaged, easy to unpack. Gets cold, door seals well, feels well-built, works like a good fridge should. It's pretty quiet; I can faintly hear it (4 feet away) in a completely silent room, but with any background noise or with the TV on, it is not noticeable at all. I bought a fridge thermometer to check it; it tells me temperatures are spot-on. I'm happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ari

customer_reviews.title: Should have listened to other reviews
customer_reviews.text: I was apprehensive after reading the reviews, but decided to go ahead and purchase. The item will not stop producing condensation, the can dispenser is not useful, and several items have ruined because the unit will not stay cold.
customer_reviews.author: Jack & Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Thank god for mini fridges!!
customer_reviews.text: Just had my mini fridge delivered today.. so far I love it.. my roommate is gross and I feel like my food gets contaminated just sharing the same fridge.. now I can eat my food in peace!!! Thank you so much!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sm

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy to say the least !!!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this fridge , set it up and nothing !!!! It just plain doesn't work ! Now we are in a dilemma as we don't know how to wrap this fridge in order to send it back for another one ! There is no way to contact Midea here on Amazon ! We have the unwrapped torn box but don't have the plastic straps to hold the bottom in !!! Very unhappy that we had to wait so long for this to be delivered , ( ordered July 12th and received at our home July 26th ) only to not work after setting it up !
customer_reviews.author: coley chase

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere for fridge
customer_reviews.text: The shelves are not adjustable, cannot stand anything up right, the soda dispenser is not user friendly, fill from the middle, and not easy due to design. Items on shelf will shift and change the temperature, cannot put items deep in fridge or they freeze, freezer frosts up.
customer_reviews.author: bought it

customer_reviews.title: Worked One Day - Warranty not Honored
customer_reviews.text: The refrigerator only worked one day. I contacted Amazon and they forwarded my complaint to Excellent Products. I never could get any response from Excellent Products regarding warranty and replacement. I took to local appliance repair and they said that thermostat was bad and the replacement thermostat was no longer available. Repair guy said refrigerator was no good and my as well drop off at the dump. So I will.
customer_reviews.author: Barton W. Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Cutest Fridge Ever
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think it would be possible to become infatuated with a fridge, but I love this little guy! It is the cutest appliance ever haha. So glad I went with a separate freezer. One caution: check the power requirements with your outlets. I think it's a little more power hungry than my room would prefer, so it trips the breaker from time to time (once or twice a month). Electrician said it isn't dangerous, but it is a bit of an inconvenience to have to trudge out to the garage and flip the switch when I'm in the middle of working.
customer_reviews.author: StickySteph

customer_reviews.title: Good, could be better.
customer_reviews.text: I really like that it has a separate freezer compartment, but it makes the fridge section smaller. You need to take that into account the separate freezer space as it makes the cubic foot size a bit misleading. It's not frost free, but comes with a scraper that is convenient. Also, the soda can dispenser is not well engineered as cans get jammed and are difficult to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Don M.

customer_reviews.title: ... for the larger freezer space and it was a great decision! The freezer works wonderfully and I have ...
customer_reviews.text: I choose this fridge for the larger freezer space and it was a great decision! The freezer works wonderfully and I have enough space to store 5 lean cuisines and two large bags of frozen vegetables. The fridge portion is a nice size as well, kind of a typical mini-fridge situation. I use this fridge to store quick, healthy options at work (where I spend A LOT of time) and I shop about once a week. The unit can be loud at times but it does not seem to bother me. I find this fridge to be perfect for my needs. I would recommend it to anyone looking to have decent storage space in a compact fridge!
customer_reviews.author: Tori Dee

customer_reviews.title: I love this fridge!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I live in an apartment with the TINIEST kitchen on earth. We replaced our monstrous old broken fridge with this beauty and a bar cart. I couldn’t be happier! The storage capability of this fridge is unreal. I usually do enough grocery shopping for two weeks in one go, and this mini fridge has no trouble holding that much food. To be fair, I intentionally purchase a lot of pantry staples to keep the fridge from combusting, but still. The freezer is particularly exciting, because it can hold two frozen pizzas and a full gallon of ice cream all at once. I do recommend getting a wider ice cream like Blue Bunny.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend as a gift and he loves it! The freezer works pretty good, freezes things super fast! And keeps everything he puts in the fridge cool. Bought this back in June 2020 and haven't had any issues with it. Make sure you wait a day or two to set up / connect fridge as It could mess up the fridge and prevent it from working.
customer_reviews.author: Cintia

customer_reviews.title: ... damaged but i was hoping mine will be delivered fine but it was damaged on the top rear corner ...
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews and a lot of ppl said the item was damaged but i was hoping mine will be delivered fine but it was damaged on the top rear corner and many little dents on the back. I understand the materiel is very cheap since I paid only $200 for two door refrigerator. It was more hassle to return and reorder. Since I cut all the box strings and I am a 5' 3" tall woman and it's hard to carry this to a UPS to repackage it. Decided to use it. Just hope the the refrigerator works fine so I don't regret keeping it. I will update my review once I feel this works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jiwon

customer_reviews.title: Great value and functional all around
customer_reviews.text: Solid unit, works as advertised. Do have to ensure to defrost it or scrape the bits of ice build up inside. But stick to the directions (or close...) and all is fine. :) Freezer section is large enough to be useful, I make ice in it (with the included ice tray) and keep a Tupperware container in there to top off and always have fresh ice on hand which is convenient as well.
customer_reviews.author: Christine W

customer_reviews.title: I bought this fridge because it was a great price. It came is a reasonable amount of ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fridge because it was a great price. It came is a reasonable amount of time, un damaged, its fairly light, and it was packaged very well and easy. However it says the doors are reversible and although in theory thats true I can't do it. The bolts for the hinge are on so tight that not even my drill can get them off. Also the bolts aren't the best of quality and they will easily strip if I try to use anymore force. I'm extremely disappointed because I really need the fridge to open the other way. I'm sure I'll figure out a way, but it's a problem I shouldn't have to solve.
customer_reviews.author: Stone H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a nursery
customer_reviews.text: Great mini fridge! Love the freezer. We are using this for our nursery and it's working out great for storing and freezing milk. It's bedside so it doubles as a night stand for me. It's fridge is cold and freezer freezes like a full size. Absolutely love. We bought the black one
customer_reviews.author: Laura DeMatteo

customer_reviews.title: Roomy... quite... and really cold
customer_reviews.text: So adorable.... I have to say it’s more then I exspected after reading other brands product reviews about their item being damaged... of course that’s the shipping not the brands fault. Anyway mine came without a scratch and it came soooo fast... I can’t say how the fridge has been it’s only been a short while , I can say it’s very quite and it has a great amount of room and it got cold really fast.... so I’ll probably write another review in a few months!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Lenox

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: A real deal for the price. Unlike some similar mini fridges this one self defrosts. I got this one because reviewers said it had good room in the freezer and it does. No shelving in it. Good. Some do and it just reduces what you can put in there. Refrigerator part is alright, but you have to get on your knees to deal with the bottom shelf. Very quiet. Defrosts a lot, which worried me at first, but everything stays cold. Forget about putting a gallon in there. It won't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Will Edelman

customer_reviews.title: Comes with a mini ice tray that makes you squeal in happiness
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. I had it standing straight up in its box for 48ish hours after reading some of the reviews and the directions and I’ve not had a problem. It’s set up in a area that doesn’t have central ac, just a window unit and I keep it on max cool and it works perfectly. Doesn’t make any noise, and the power cord isn’t outrageously short. It comes with a mini ice cube tray and it’s adorable. There’s a mini drawer that I use for snacks storage and it works great. Definitely worth the money and no complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for my classroom
customer_reviews.text: This is the envy of all the other teachers. I really like that it has a separate freezer. I do not like the glass shelves because I am worried that they are not as strong as they could be, but so far no issues. I also do not need the soda holder and feel that it takes up too much space. It is the perfect size for my classroom and I can bring food for a few days so I don't have to worry about buying my lunch.
customer_reviews.author: tara jo

customer_reviews.title: better to have it all looking like new after a ...
customer_reviews.text: Been going for nearly a year in my office environment. Relatively quiet, and it's close to work spaces, so that's appreciated. Switching the doors was a bit of a pain, but doable. However, a few of the black hole filler caps that needed to be pried out and inserted in the new holes after switching sides of the door hinges didn't come out without snapping. They should have provided spares since it's really hard not to damage them. This does not affect the function and really isn't all that that noticeable, but still, better to have it all looking like new after a door switch.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Quiet as it gets for a compact fridge, good temperature
customer_reviews.text: I just got rid of a new Frigidaire compact because of the rattling noise from the compressor. I tried to put up with it for a year but finally gave up trying to sleep through it. This one still has some minor compressor noise but no rattling and tolerable. I've seen a lot of these since I get assigned to different offices and this is the quietest I've seen. Consumer reports was all wrong about the Frigidaire though. That said, very difficult to find small fridge that doesn't produce noise in the same room you sleep in.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: Great looks(stainless) , and well thought out, and fairly quiet. Nice storage zones. Holds a good amount considering the size. My only detraction is the climate control. In order to have cold drinks in the refrigerator section things tend to freeze towards the rear of the fridge. When lowered to stop things from freezing the beverages aren't cold enough to my liking.
customer_reviews.author: E. Pinder

customer_reviews.title: Funny spell after only a few months...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item in June, and at the end of September I started noticing a funny smell in my office. It smells like a burning smell from the back of the refrigerator. It still works, but makes my whole office stink. I'm currently trying to Exchange the item but it said by cut off was July
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: I Love The Refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe how much I like it, it arrived undamaged, and is very nice looking and very quiet. Being a compressor type design it uses less electricity than the more techie types of cooling. I have had zero ice build up in the freezer, it froze ice super fast I thought The tray that comes with it has very tiny cubes, not American style, that's for sure. Use 2 Wal-Mart plastic ice trays, they work great. Brand might be Rubbermiaid, not sure. The refrigerator is a winner, I think, and a bit better than similar units at Wal-Mart that cost about $10 more.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey D Boozer

customer_reviews.title: Yep, it freezes stuff hard.
customer_reviews.text: It's a souped up dorm fridge. The separate freezer compartment actually keeps things frozen, (unlike the one-door mini fridge/freezers that don't really freeze anything). I like it. So far, no problems. The refrigerator compartment is a bit smaller than ideal (to make room for the freezer motor, I assume), but the freezer compartment is perfect. The black finish is very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Clothes Monkey

customer_reviews.title: our office Hero
customer_reviews.text: this is my new office hero..big enough so that 6 of us are sharing this little guy with room for everybodies beverage of choice, creamer, lunch bags..we keep ice and ice cream bars in the freezer..bags of berries for smoothies everybody puts a bottle of water in the upper freezer for quick ice cold drinks..lots of room...makes no discernable noise in the office
customer_reviews.author: pennypincher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my outdoor bar area
customer_reviews.text: Great product so far. Freezer is awesome, I put 4 ice trays in there. Freezes within a couple hours. The indoor storage could be slightly better, the spot for cans only fit tiny 8oz Lime-Rita cans, but hey.... the little storage drawer is spacious as well. So overall, I'm happy, If placing under a bar or counter, measure 3x. lol I swear it stated 27.5" but it's 33". Great Little Frig though!
customer_reviews.author: LokiNee

customer_reviews.title: It's like black magic! A box that keeps things cold...
customer_reviews.text: This is the most frightening thing ever. This box has an electrical cord that when plugged in becomes cold inside. What kind of black magic is this thing? There's a ton of room inside and there's even a tiny box attached at the top that freezes stuff such as water! It's like the Antarctic, Siberia and my former girl friend giving me the cold shoulder. I'm talking icy!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great value and performance!
customer_reviews.text: What a great fridge! And freezer combo! I originally had a Haier Fridge and I was great! Had plenty of storage however the freezer was lacking. It was in a small compartment in the upper right corner. Couldn’t store much besides an ice tray or one single entree. So I was in desperate search for the perfect fridge with a separate door for the freezer, and this was the one! Ample space in freezer, took a little sacrifice in fridge space but so worth it. Very quiet and great build quality! If having a decent size freezer is important to you highly recommend this unit!
customer_reviews.author: Boramy

customer_reviews.title: Super pleased with the replacement service we experienced
customer_reviews.text: The first one that we received had a big dent on the bottom right side of the outer white panel. It seemed to be just a cosmetic hit so we decided to try it out and it ended up being kind of loud and rattled. So, we returned and received a new one. We thought that it would be a hassle to return, but it was picked up the day after we submitted the request and we received the replacement the day after that. Super pleased with the replacement service we experienced. We are very happy at the office with the fridge now and love having more freezer space versus our tiny in fridge freezer we had before.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: It gets a bit noisy but usually doesn’t bother me. Storage is what you would expect for a mini fridge—the freezer is actually larger than expected. However, I wish the freezer had a separate temperature control. Ice packs and water based things freeze fine, but ice cream gets kind of soft while down in the fridge portion, things are the back of the fridge started to freeze. This is a problem I’ve encountered with every mini fridge-freezer combo, though, so I was kind of expecting it even if hoping it wouldn’t happen again. I mainly bought it for storing ice packs and drinks, so it works for what I need it to.
customer_reviews.author: Anie H

customer_reviews.title: Extremely quiet and controls temperature very well
customer_reviews.text: The size is great. Holds more than I expected. Freezer is tall and has great space also. This IS a mini fridge, but this one holds a lot. The temperature control is consistent. Find the setting you like and you don't have to adjust it again. They only thing I can complain about is the slight build up of frost in the freezer. I've never had a mini fridge that this did not happen to. This one is used full time and after over a month, the frost is a very thin layer. Will wait another month or two before I bother to defrost with a couple bowls if hot water.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Mary

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but a fool designed the door storage.
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great EXCEPT the door storage. Whoever designed the storage for inside the door... so inefficient. I could slap them. Waste of space. Freezer makes ice so fast, it’s super quiet, you can set it really cold, easy to adjust. Just like most fridges, when it’s on it’s coldest setting, things in the very back tend to freeze.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: A great refrigerator for my office
customer_reviews.text: Some people have complained that it isn't possible to get soda cans in the holder. That certainly hasn't been my experience. You just need to give the cans a push. I can store six cans in the holder and it's very easy to remove a can--either from the bottom, middle or top. I also really like the size of the freezer, which allows me to store frozen meals, ice cube trays, and yes, even a bottle of vodka. I love having my own refrigerator in my private office, so I don't need to rely on the cleanliness of the other big refrigerators in my office. A great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Laura J.B.

customer_reviews.title: Freezes slowly bit looks nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a little bigger than. I anticipated, but it looks like a sleek fridge just 1/3 the size. It is exceptionally quiet, and can fit a decent amount for a mini fridge. The only qualms I have with this are that if you put freeze pops in the freezer, they take days to freeze. Even on high it only will keep frozen what was already frozen. Also make sure it isn't on a fuse circuit that has much on it, I had to relocate it to several different rooms before I found a place it wouldn't blow a fuse (older house) Overall I recommend
customer_reviews.author: Ducksauce

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast and product was superbly packaged to protect it from damage. I bought this for my classroom. It is the perfect size for the room. It easily holds a 12 pack of sodas or juice boxes, a half gallon of milk fits in the door, and it has a veggie drawer! I have quite a few items in it right now and it has kept things nice and cold. The freezer keeps popsicles solid without a problem! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: sjski

customer_reviews.title: Nice size. Did work good when it worked
customer_reviews.text: Nice size. Did work good when it worked. It broke in about a week. The freezer and the refrigerator just stopped cooling. But Amazon Prime picked up thru UPS for free the very next day after I put in for a refund and refunded me my money in a timely manner. So I can't complain. Things can happen.
customer_reviews.author: C. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: A fine refrigerator that does a 👍 great job in cooling cold foods.😋
customer_reviews.text: This fine refigerator is small but I needed something that is fitting into a tight space and being efficient. The worry I had was how this unit would be bounced around in the delivery but Amazon chose this unit with a better company as UPS. They made sure that the refrigerator was. Well cardboard cover protected and in nce shape. In installing being small and low I placed the unit on a four leg wide stand. All works fine and cool.I was hopeing to fill the top ice chest wih a 20# bag of ice. It Is real hot this year in Florida.😅
customer_reviews.author: michael Labadie

customer_reviews.title: Great Mini Fridge!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Takes time for mini fridge to get cold when first starting up. After about a day or two it is ice cold! If set to max setting the fridge part will freeze your items if placed in the far back for about a day. I constantly open and close this fridge throughout the day at work and it has always kept my food/drinks cold! Did not have any bad experience with packaging. Fridge came without and dents or scratches. Freezer works great as well. Would definitely buy again if I am in need of another mini fridge!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad, but the description is incorrect...
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived with a large dent in the bottom door, but I figured it wasn't worth trying to ship it back for a replacement. Just so people know, this little unit only automatically defrosts the refrigerator coils, but the freezer portion is not frost-free / auto defrosting. That being said, the double-door system is less likely to frost over than a single door system.
customer_reviews.author: PCole

customer_reviews.title: Look and price are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little frig to use temporarily while replacing a regular sized one that is on the fritz. It is very small but DOES have a separate freezer that works well. I just plugged it in, turned the control to MAX as instructed and it is running so quietly that you don't even know it's there. This item would be perfect for an office, a dorm room, a cabin, etc. It looks expensive. I am really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: picky senior

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, love the separate fridge and freezer compartments
customer_reviews.text: I definitely would buy this fridge again. It seems worth the price, definitely because of the freezer if not anything else. The freezer is separate from the fridge, which means it definitely keeps your items frozen without freezing everything else. This is perfect for keeping in a bedroom if you have roommates. The fridge is a pretty good size and the freezer fits more than I was expecting. I ended up giving it to my mom for her outdoor bar it still looks great after over a year. The quality is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best mini fridge!
customer_reviews.text: This fridge is the way to go! The separate freezer is fantastic! It's much bigger than I expected. The bottom fridge is room too. I'm not much of a pop drinker so I wish the door had different arrangement options but who cares! I absolutely love this fridge. The light, the reversible door, the veggie crisper... it's an actual mini fridge. I followed the hint from other reviewers and did not plug it in immediately after delivery. Instead I let it sit for 4+ hours to let the coolant settle. Works like a champ! I HIGHLY recommend!
customer_reviews.author: BabsBuys

customer_reviews.title: Obviously a returned and re-sold unit
customer_reviews.text: This fridge was badly needed by an elderly relative and was delivered directly to their house. Upon arrival, it was very, very clear the box had been opened previously and a huge amount of clear packing tape held things together. And the tape had yellowed meaning it probably sat in storage for quite some time. Unpacking the supposed new unit revealed some cosmetic damage. It had been dropped at some point. Whether it happened in transit or not, the fridge was poorly repacked and probably a return. I can’t say much more than it worked when I plugged it in. If it wasn’t needed so badly, I would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Nutmegger

customer_reviews.title: Get the warranty.
customer_reviews.text: Refrigerator worked for 10days before compressor gave out. You only have 30 days to return. If you purchase I highly recommend getting extended warranty be cause after 30 days no refunds. I’m lucky it broke early because I didn’t have extended warranty. But I did loose all my food that was in the Fridge. I’ll be buying my next Fridge from Walmart. Because now I’m with out a fridge until I receive my refund which can take up to 3-4 days. At least at Walmart I could have exchanged the product there.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed and frustrated
customer_reviews.text: Within the first week of use, already have larfe area of droplets forming in back wall of lower level. I have bought the 3 year warranty-Assurant but they are telling me I must go through manufacturer first about the issue. Manufacturer is no help. I should of listened to the reviews on this frig, that were seeing the same issue. Disappointed and frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Name

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw
customer_reviews.text: Can holder in the door is about 3-5cm too small! Twice now cans have been punctured within 3 weeks with rare use. once getting it in, once getting it out. Resulting in pop spraying all over with big sticky mess at in-opportune times. Otherwise I have always wanted a mini fridge and felt it was a dream come true. Besides for the can holder in door, everything is great.
customer_reviews.author: RocknTrain

customer_reviews.title: Came fast
customer_reviews.text: Our main refrigerator broke and in this day and age we have to wait 2 weeks for it to be repaired (it's only 3 1/2 years old). The Midea came within 2 days of ordering and had been a life saver. It's a decent little fridge. Keeps food cool even though it's in a warm garage. And it's not noisy. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Trock

customer_reviews.title: This fridge is wonderful and works perfectly for the space
customer_reviews.text: This fridge is wonderful and works perfectly for the space, the only complaint I have is that the fridge door has a huge dent in the front which was strange. The packaging had no dents or anything so I imagine it happened before being packaged? I needed it right away so I won't be replacing it as it doesn't affect how it works at all. But overall this is an awesomely wonderful mini fridge and I would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Owens

customer_reviews.title: When i opened packaged product was dented and had various ...
customer_reviews.text: When i opened packaged product was dented and had various dings, small leg was broken and has a teeter now.... but box was not damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy grandson makes a happy grandma.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my grandson's dorm room after reading all the reviews on many small refrigerators. My grandson loves it and enjoys that it has a larger freezer and can make his own ice with enough room to store food too. He has it next to his bed and said that it doesn't make any noise to keep him up at night.
customer_reviews.author: Finola

customer_reviews.title: Great mini fridge
customer_reviews.text: My only after thought is that maybe I should have got one without the can option. It works. Freezer has more space than I thought. I rent a room in a 7 bedroom house. There are 6 tenements and the 2 fridges the land lord provides fills fast. This is perfect for my room. I keep my yogurt, snacks, drinks, and convenient items so I don't have to go down stairs. I am not unsocial, it is that with Covid, I hide in my room. It is very quite.
customer_reviews.author: Looking

customer_reviews.title: Came with a dent on top but works great
customer_reviews.text: Like many others, mine arrived with a small dent on the top; right where the padding ended. The styrofoam padding covered the corners and not the middle and that is where the dent is. however, the fridge is super quiet and works just fine. Since I will be putting this under a desk or cabinet the dent won't be seen. If I have to have it out in the open I will just put a decorative cloth over the top to hide the dent. As quiet as it is, this is perfect for my office.
customer_reviews.author: Wandering the Globe

customer_reviews.title: 3.5/5: solid, but has problems
customer_reviews.text: In the fridge compartment, the back wall in fact freezes, so any produce/fruit that touches it will become frozen. Very unfortunate issue. The fridge door also features odd compartments, making it difficult to store things other than canned beverages.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Adultman

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this fridge for 2 years now and it's still running strong. Not the most space but it still meets my needs. Will definitely consider this brand when I purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: SoCal Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spacious, but freezes everything
customer_reviews.text: We got this fridge to supplement the fridge in our apartment that freezes every type of produce. Even on it's lowest setting, this mini-fridge leaves a significant amount of condensation inside (which causes lettuce, herbs, and greens to go bad faster) and froze all of our produce. We've tried using different parts of the fridge to see if there was a cold spot, but the whole thing is freezing. What's bizarre is that we put popsicles in the freezer portion, and every single one of them melted to a smoothie consistency. Definitely not ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Funshyne328

customer_reviews.title: It looks pretty, very good fridge for a small space
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fridge for my office. It looks pretty, very good fridge for a small space, but the fridge is spacious inside. I like that the freezer has a separate door, it keeps stuff frozen better. Recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: I.K.

customer_reviews.title: Super fast delivery but if you drink cans of soda, stay away from this one.
customer_reviews.text: It turned out to be exactly the same as our old one that we loved so much. It stopped working after five years and we haven't figured out what went wrong. It shouldn't be anything serious. We could not wait to have it fixed but bought this one right away. But compared with our old one, the fridge door of this one is almost a joke, very inefficient. The door can only hold bottles and cans!!! As we don’t drink soda, the door space is wasted. Very disappointed! We even tried to see if we could switch it with the old door.
customer_reviews.author: Holiday Shopping

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 5 months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this less than 5 months ago, and it has stopped working already. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great fridge!
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a few weeks now and honestly totally worth every penny spent. Keeps goodies frozen and cold. Very good especially for how cheap it is.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Bought for daughter for college
customer_reviews.text: It survived one year so far. It is not too loud and keeps the food at a good temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Anderson

customer_reviews.title: So far so good @ 30 days!
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm really liking this mini fridge. It's spacious, super quiet, and best of all, the two door system is fantastic! My gelato stays frozen and so far not a single bit of ice over. My only complaint thus far is the built in soda rack/dispenser. It does NOT fit 12 Oz cans. I'm now using 7oz mini soda cans in there but this was not obvious by looking at it. After 30 days I'm finding this an excellent purchase, especially at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: george r

customer_reviews.title: great temperature control and space!
customer_reviews.text: The fridge looks nicer and bigger than I expected. It holds a very good temperature. I love the freezer. I was worried that it wouldn't keep my meat frozen or wouldn't have enough space but I'm pleased to see that it was the opposite. This is a great refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Original Stopped Cooling in a Couple Days | Replacement Stopped Cooling in a Couple Days
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and separate freezer section however my original unit stopped working within a couple of days. Amazon quickly sent me a replacement. I waited 36 hours before plugging it in, just to be sure, and it worked fine for about 5 days then once again stopped working. Amazon won't send another replacement and got on the phone with Midea's customer service to request a full refund. Midea just told me to throw the unit away. I'm wondering if there's something I can do to either fix the thermostat or the connection between the thermostat and the compressor.
customer_reviews.author: Justin L. Fredette

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a few months, then nothing but the interior light works. Ice melted, food spoiled... but at least I can see the moldy food :-(
customer_reviews.author: msvertigo

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice looking unit and
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking unit and, when running, is very quiet. The separate freezer/refrigerator is the way to go on these small units. It does stay cold and the freezer will freeze things; however, it won't hold a constant temperature. The temperature varies 10-15 degrees without opening the doors other than to check the temperature. I will probably get a more known brand the next time I purchase one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Hogdooz

customer_reviews.title: Damaged :( but the fridge itself works great
customer_reviews.text: Damaged :( I was one of the ones who received one with a dent on the door =/. The fridge works great. Bigger than I thought it'd be xD.
customer_reviews.author: Baltazar Valdez

customer_reviews.title: I like it, it works well
customer_reviews.text: I like it, it works well, it's great that it has a separate freezer that, miracle of miracles, actually keeps things like ice cream frozen... but has anyone figured out what the deal is with the can rack in the door? You know, the one that throws cans everywhere if I close the door less-than-gently? Other than that, great mini-fridge for a great price. NOTE: If you're going to use this as a beer fridge (as I do!), the fridge portion will not hold very many 750ml bottles because of the shelf placement. It's a bummer. Full-size growlers will have trouble as well. Just a heads up!
customer_reviews.author: philosoraptor

customer_reviews.title: This fridge is really nice. I am very pleased
customer_reviews.text: This fridge is really nice. I am very pleased. The one possible downside for some is that the door has a built in can holder that cannot be removed, which caused some people to rate lower, or the reviews would probably be almost all 5 Star.
customer_reviews.author: VemTek

customer_reviews.title: Very Good refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: Received it on my front porch in great condition no scratches or dents, the temperature of the unit is great keeps everything cold, I left it stand for about 12 hours before I plugged it they said on the box to let sit upright for 2 hours, it's very quiet the freezer holds alot,the frigerator could been bigger for me,the shelves are to close together,I still recomend it😀
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Flash

customer_reviews.title: Fake pictures!
customer_reviews.text: It's fairly quiet and seems to hold temperature well, but the photos are totally faked. It shows a coke can on it's side in the door, and I can't even fit a tiny 6oz V8 in that spot. Otherwise, nice. Good for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: KMcKnRose

customer_reviews.title: Bad choice
customer_reviews.text: Bought end of April it is aug and no longer works
customer_reviews.author: isabella

customer_reviews.title: Working well, looks nice
customer_reviews.text: I like this fridge - there are a bunch of options on Amazon that are around the same price, and I though this one looked particularly nice. It is VERY quiet (I have yet to notice any noise in my small office). On small gripe is that the soft drink can holder/dispenser is very tight. You have to squeeze cans in there, and bend 'em up a bit. Still works fine. Freezer is cold, and after several weeks there is no frost buildup.
customer_reviews.author: danno

customer_reviews.title: Well-made product.
customer_reviews.text: I use it in my home office for drinks and snacks. It came well-packed and didn't have a single scratch or dent on it. It appears to work very well, and makes no noise at all; it replaces a 20-year-old single-door Sanyo built-in under-the- counter model. I really like the separate freezer section with its own door. My only con so far is the extremely useless soda can rack in the door. Looks like $229.00 well-spent.
customer_reviews.author: John Hinckley

customer_reviews.title: Can holder is too small for regular cans
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little quiet fridge. The freezer compartment stays cold, you can make and store ice cubes in it (couldn't do that with my old one). The only thing, the can holder in the door takes up a lot of valuable door real estate considering it is not big enough for regular sized cans. You can only use it with the small soda cans, because the regular size ones are so tight that you can't really get them out again without denting them or breaking a nail.
customer_reviews.author: gw1717

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: love this product. roomy, and quiet. its about 8 feet from my head in bed and i never hear it. the freezer really keeps my ice bucket frozen and although some frost does form on the inside walls, its minor. we just unplug and open the freezer door for 1/2 hr and wipe down. but it does come with a scraper. highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: bajarickster

customer_reviews.title: makes a loud
customer_reviews.text: makes a loud sound for some reason I don't know why
customer_reviews.author: Adniel C.

customer_reviews.title: Buy a different mini fridge - definitely not this one
customer_reviews.text: The freezer has extreme frost build up - have to defrost every other week. Don't bother with this unit if you plan on using the freezer portion.
customer_reviews.author: Wompwomp

customer_reviews.title: Damaged refridgerator
customer_reviews.text: This was my mothers gift for mothers day. I have no one to talk to and its all dented up. While I am fine with it being dented on the side because its facing the wall. It would be nice of the company to have a way to talk to them or at least offer something off since I did pay full price for it and its damaged. My mother is in a nursing home and this is all she ask for this year... I was not about to tell her she could not have it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect office fridge!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my home office. It’s everything the description says it is. It arrived in excellent condition! Extremely roomy in comparison to others. Love the the little freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Works like a budget compact-good but not great
customer_reviews.text: Works like you would expect. I love the separate freezer section for ice and such. The only drawback I have experienced is that condensation does build up on the back wall of the main compartment. That is a bummer. But for the price, expect to sacrifice automatic defrost and adequate insulation. Otherwise, you get what you pay for, and with that, it works very well in the office.
customer_reviews.author: M. Chai

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Wanted this refrigerator/freezer to fill in the gap of receiving a replacement full size refrigerator/freezer. As advertised. I will be able to use this in the garage when my full size refrigerator/freezer arrives. Especially liked that it has it's own freezer section that you access without having to open up the refrigerator section.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Great Small RV Refrigerator!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for use in RV. Very energy efficient. Uses half the energy of the smaller refrigerator without a freezer section it replaced. Runs nicely on the BESTEK® 2 AC Outlets 1000W Power Inverter DC 12V to AC 110V also purchased from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Capt. Frank

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice little fridge and the freezer is large enough to ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice little fridge and the freezer is large enough to put quite a bit of stuff. I used it for about two years and it did a great job. The separate freezer was a deciding factor in this purchase, and it worked fine, holding a fair amount of stuff, considering the size. It doesn't have self-defrost in the freezer, so it needs to be defrosted about every 7 to 8 months, but that's easy. Electrical consumption is low, and it's not noisy. It's been completely trouble-free and easy to clean. Overall an excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Estimed_customer

customer_reviews.title: It works as advertized
customer_reviews.text: It works, it gets and stays cold better than our old one, especially after it died. It has more overall space but be aware it will not hold a half gallon of milk or anything that tall on the shelves, one mostly fits in the door but that is not the best place for milk.
customer_reviews.author: MCA Connectors

customer_reviews.title: I love this little fridge
customer_reviews.text: I bought as a replacement for a similarly sized one that died and I keep in my garage for extra items. The old one had a small freezer compartment, but I love how this one mirrors a large refrigerator with a true freezer compartment. It completely serves the needed purposes. Definitely recommend for some extra cooling/freezing.
customer_reviews.author: CK Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Works great and has light inside when you open door
customer_reviews.text: Works great and has light inside when you open door,most mini refrigerators don't have a light,and freezer works great also.good product I'm very satisfied with this product,highly recommended it .
customer_reviews.author: Ben.R

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This fridge exceeded my expectations! It has a whole lot of room on the inside and cooled quickly once I plugged it in! Looks great in my room and it’s pretty quiet! I was nervous to buy it once I saw some reviews about receiving it damaged but it was packaged perfectly and was damaged at all! Great buy! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Separate freezer compartment
customer_reviews.text: Unlike many small freezers, this one has a separate freezer compartment that keeps my renter's frozen foods frozen and the refrigerator foods 'unfrozen'.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis A. Souza

customer_reviews.title: Great mini fridge
customer_reviews.text: Had to turn it up to Max setting to get the beverages to the coldness I prefer but it fits plenty of bottles and cans. The freezer is deep as well so you can a good amount of ice cream or other frozen snacks. You can hear the fridge when it starts cooling but it isn't an annoyance.
customer_reviews.author: FX

customer_reviews.title: Great Fridge for dorm room excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this refrigerator freezer for our daughters dorm. this is a beautiful little refrigirator perfect for a small room. Having double doors is a big plus. Our daughter loves this one. difficult to understand the size but this is only counter high (33") . Amazon delivered quickly on time . very good value
customer_reviews.author: VENKAT VAVILALA

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Might be the best fridge below $200, don't worry about those build up at the back of fridge, it will not brother your normal use, and it will not be that much so you don't even have to clean them only if you're living in a high moisture environment, mine only had a little bit after 5 month use
customer_reviews.author: XU FENG

customer_reviews.title: Another repackaged item claiming to be new by amazon product
customer_reviews.text: PRODUCT WAS DELIVERED WITH NO PLATE ON BACK SO ALL WIRES EXPOSED. THE BOTTOM HAS BEEN SMASHED REPAIRED GHETTO WITH A FAKE LEG YOU CAN SEE IN PICTURE WITH BRACKET AND NEW DIFFERENT GHETTO LEG. IT IS UNSTABLE AND WON'T EVEN STAND ON 4 TINY LEGS WITHOUT SHAKING. IT IS REPACKED RETURNED GARAGE BAGS YOU SENT US AS NEW. MY WIFE DROVE UP TO OUR HOME WITH 3 YOUNG KIDS TO SEE THIS. I WANT MY MONEY BACK. USING WALMART AND TARGET FOR PURCHASES MOVING FORWARD
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Graves

customer_reviews.title: Compact Refrigerator/Freezer
customer_reviews.text: It has a dent but I’ll just cover it with a sticker. It has a lot of space and you can also store drinks in the freezer is actually pretty good size. It’s perfect for my skincare business because I can store my ice cubes for facials and I can have plenty of drinks and snacks for my clients.
customer_reviews.author: NancyAES

customer_reviews.title: Great product at good price.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dorm fridge I have seen to date. We needed a mini fridge with a separate freezer compartment with its own door. This fridge and freezer compartments are deep enough to store a lot of items. The fridge is so quiet that I started doubting whether it is working. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bala

customer_reviews.title: Solid fridge
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good fridge. I’ve had it for a year now. Freezer ices up, as is pretty typical for this type of thing. Seems to cool the back of the fridge more than the front, but as long as you know that you’ll be ok!
customer_reviews.author: Jake Trujillo

product_meta.title: Midea 3.1 Cu. Ft. Compact Refrigerator, WHD-113FSS1 - Stainless Steel
product_meta.description:
Style:Double Door| Color:Stainless SteelDesigned to operate with Energy Star efficiency, the Midea 3.1 Cu. Ft. Double Door Compact Refrigerator offers separate fridge and freezer sections with plenty of space for produce, snacks, and frozen treats. Thanks to its adjustable legs and reversible door that opens to the left or right, you can easily fit this compact fridge in any kitchen layout. Organization is made even easier with durable glass shelves, a roomy crisper drawer, and storage racks for soda cans. The mechanical temperature control lets you easily set chilling preferences, while the manual defrost setting enables hassle-free cleaning.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Established in 1968, Midea Group has been included in the latest edition of the Fortune 500 list of global companies. Dedicated to the improvements in design, production, and technology innovation, Midea has been given more than 40 design awards throughout the world. With wide product selection, Midea has become one of the largest and the most reliable manufacturer of major and home appliances in the world.Temperature Settings : Off - 6
feature_bullets: Your purchase includes One Midea 3.1 Cu. Ft. Compact Refrigerator, WHD-113FSS1 model in Stainless Steel
Refrigerator dimensions: 3.1 Cu Ft inner space | 18.50” W x 19.37” D x 32.95” H | Product weight: 52.20 lbs
The internal refrigerator temperature range from 32F to 50F and the freezer temperatures range from -11.2F to 5F
Conveniently set your fridge door to open to the left or right, depending on the layout of your kitchen
Energy Star Rated, UL Energy Certification
